faqs.question: Können Ausländer Immobilien in Spanien kaufen?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Foreign nationals have identical property ownership rights to Spanish citizens, with no residency requirements or restrictions on property categories. British, European, American, and other international buyers routinely acquire residential properties throughout Spain. Legal processes are straightforward with assistance from qualified Spanish property lawyers.

faqs.question: Welche Kosten fallen beim Immobilienkauf in Spanien an?
faqs.answer: Beyond the €535,000 purchase price, expect acquisition costs of approximately 6-8% including transfer tax (ITP at 6-7%), notary fees (€800-1,200), registry fees (€300-400), and legal representation (€1,000-1,500). Mortgage costs, if applicable, include arrangement fees and insurance. Die jährlichen Grundsteuern and community fees thereafter represent ongoing costs.

faqs.question: Kann ich als Ausländer eine Hypothek in Spanien bekommen?
faqs.answer: Yes, foreign buyers typically qualify for Spanish mortgages covering 60-80% of property value through major banks. Requirements include proof of income, employment verification, and creditworthiness assessment—processes familiar to international borrowers. Interest rates remain competitive compared to Northern European equivalents. Many expatriate buyers utilize remortgage strategies to leverage home country equity.

faqs.question: Ist die Costa Blanca ein guter Ort zum Immobilienkauf?
faqs.answer: Absolutely, Costa Blanca represents Spain's most established international residential market with consistent appreciation (8% year-on-year), established expatriate infrastructure, excellent healthcare and education facilities, and diverse lifestyle options. Finestrat specifically has emerged as the region's premier residential destination, attracting quality-conscious international buyers seeking authentic Mediterranean living.

faqs.question: Wie hoch sind die Lebenshaltungskosten an der Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca offers exceptional value—grocery costs run 20-30% below Northern Europe, dining varies from €15 casual meals to €60+ fine dining, utilities average €100-150 monthly, and healthcare through private insurance costs significantly less than UK NHS alternatives. Overall, couples can enjoy comfortable lifestyles on €1,500-2,000 monthly excluding property costs.

faqs.question: Ist die Costa Blanca gut für Rentner?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca has become Europe's premier retirement destination offering affordable living costs, excellent healthcare with English-speaking practitioners, established expatriate communities reducing isolation, Mediterranean climate, and 300+ annual sunshine days. Retirees benefit from Spain's favorable residency visas, excellent public healthcare access, and thriving social infrastructure specifically designed for mature professionals.

faqs.question: Wie weit ist die Costa Blanca von Deutschland entfernt?
faqs.answer: Alicante International Airport, 45 minutes from this Sierra Cortina property, operates direct flights to London and British regional airports with journey times of 2.5-3 hours. Ferry options from southern Spain to Morocco then onward provide alternative transport. The proximity enables frequent UK visits whilst maintaining Mediterranean residence.

faqs.question: Wie ist das Wetter an der Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca enjoys Mediterranean climate with 300+ annual sunshine days, average temperatures of 18°C winter and 28°C summer, minimal rainfall concentrated in autumn/spring, and cooling sea breezes throughout summer. Sierra Cortina's elevation provides additional summer cooling whilst maintaining the region's characteristic mild winters—rarely experiencing freezing temperatures.

faqs.answer: This property exhibits strong rental fundamentals with typical weekly rates of €800 for holiday lettings, generating approximately €35,000-40,000 annually with reasonable vacancy assumptions. The established international community and proximity to beaches, golf courses, and restaurants support consistent tourist demand. Professional property management services throughout Finestrat handle operational logistics efficiently.
